job.title: Lead Software Engineer
job.description: ulliPrimary Locationlili3003 Summit Blvd Atlanta GA USADivisionliliCox AutomotiveJob LevelliliIndividual ContributorTravelliliNoScheduleliliFulltimeShiftliliDay JobRequisition Numberlili216643Cox Automotive is currently looking for aliliLead Software Engineer to join our team in Atlanta GAAbout the TeamOur team works across many business units within Cox Automotive providing advanced computer vision solutions for customer facing products About the PositionYou will serve as the technical leader for a scrum team responsible for several different projects Working with computer vision specialists you will help design implement deliver and support image classification localization and segmentation solutions that must process tens of millions of images per dayCox Automotive is transforming the way the world buys sells and owns cars Come join the transformationliliPrimary Responsibilities and Essential Functions Build solutions exclusively using AWS technologies and offerings including SNS and SQS S3 DynamoDB Lambda API Gateway Athena Aurora Glue and FirehoseliliHave end to end ownership of solutions from clarifying requirements to collaborating on architectural design technical documentation programming manual and automated testing building deploying validating monitoring and rotating afterhours operational support Take an active role in identifying and prioritizing opportunities for investment in the technical nonfunctional requirements of the system Participate in evaluations of new technologies platforms frameworks and techniques collaborating with your peers to help shape the direction of the engineering group Experience maintaining and diagnosing issues in production using various monitoring tools including cloud logs metrics applicationdb analytics QualificationsliliMinimum SkillsExperience 5 years of professional handson software development experience writing code for software applications Bachelors degree in Computer Science or related field or equivalent work experience Professional experience with a static language C Java Go etc and a dynamic language Python Ruby JavaScript etc and understand the tradeoffs of each Experience working with relational databases including writing queries evaluating performance and designing schemaliliWorking knowledge of Git and branching patterns Ability to take direction at the level of problems to solve and provide options and direction on potential solutions Experience working in a continuous integration testing and delivery process employing automation Openness to feedback and ability to creatively adapt multiple ideas into a solution Analytical skills and the ability to break complex and challenging problems and defects down until they become actionable Familiarity with producing technical writing including high and low level diagramming techniques A desire to succeed as a team and contribute to a culture of continuous improvement and growth of all team membersbrliulThis includes mentorship both formal and informal and collaborating with other team members to share knowledge Experience maintaining and diagnosing issues in production using various monitoring tools including cloud logs metrics applicationdb analyticsbrulliWhat We Look For Experience with lean methodologiesliliPublic speaking skills Teaching or tutoring experience Familiarity with AWS Cloud Formation and patterns of Infrastructure as Code Experience with nonrelational data stores especially Elasticsearch and DynamoDB We AreAbout Cox AutomotiveTheres nothing ordinary about Cox Automotive We are people of every background driven by our passion for mobility innovation client success and community outreach We make buying selling and owning or simply using cars easier for everyone Touching more than 40000 clients across five continents we bring together the best brands and the best teams to propel the automotive industry forward Some of those team members work for our iconic consumer brands like Autotrader and Kelley Blue Book while others are creating the future of automotive at industryfacing brands like Dealercom Manheim and vAutoliliAbout CoxliliWe are the Cox family of businesses Weve been making our mark since 1898 by building and evolving worldclass businesses staying true to our values and encouraging top talent to always look for growth and impact while building a career with usbrliulOur primary divisions  Cox Communications and Cox Automotive  are driving a new wave of innovation powering smart cities with powerhouse broadband communications and pioneering greener more progressive transportation alternatives for individuals and fleet operatorsbrbrWere also expanding into new spaces like cleantech and healthcare to rev up our momentum toward building a better future for the next generationbrbrWere looking for the talent today who will be our leaders tomorrow Sound intriguing Learn more about where we are today where we hope youll be going with us and the common purpose that unites us at of working at Cox may include health care insurance medical dental vision retirement planning 401k and paid days off sick
